DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response for assessments related to contraception and/or intercourse.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The prevention of conception or impregnation by the use of devices or drugs or surgery._The act of sexual procreation between a man and a woman; the man's penis is inserted into the woman's vagina and excited until orgasm and ejaculation occur._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The prevention of conception or impregnation by the use of devices or drugs or surgery.

Concepts.definition: The prevention of conception or impregnation by the use of devices or drugs or surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of sexual procreation between a man and a woman; the man's penis is inserted into the woman's vagina and excited until orgasm and ejaculation occur.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: A sexual act where a man's penis is inserted into the woman's vagina and excited until orgasm and ejaculation occur.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the patient's ability to conceive or nurse offspring and/or their current reproductive status.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Unknown Not Applicable Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

Concepts.longName: Yes, No, Unknown, or Not Applicable Response
Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, unknown, or not applicable.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 requested By Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership  transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/23/16 jk value "Not evaluable" added in error by COG on 3/21/16 was removed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient been informed
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient been informed of the risks and advised of the necessity of using  an accepted and effective method of contraception or abstaining from sexual intercourse for the duration of their participation in the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: E4112
ReferenceDocuments.description: If yes, has the patient been strongly advised to use an accepted and effective method of contraception OR to abstain from sexual intercourse for the duration of their participation in the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ALT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have women of childbearing potential and sexually active males been informed of the risks and advised of the necessity of using an accepted and effective method of contraception or abstaining from sexual intercourse for the duration of their participation in the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EAI142 Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is a female of childbearing potential or a sexually active male, will patient use an accepted and effective method of contraception or abstain from sexual intercourse for the duration of their participation in the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EA5123
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is a woman of childbearing potential or sexually active male, has he or she been strongly advised to use an accepted and effective method of contraception or to abstain from sexual intercourse for the duration of their participation in the study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: EA1141 EC
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient is of childbearing potential, was patient strongly advised to use an accepted and effective method of contraception or to abstain from sexual intercourse for the following year until the Year 1 AB-MR and DBT studies are performed?

DataElement.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElement.changeDescription: 3-2-15 ADSC approved_tt._6/5/14 edit to VD and long name. tt 10/2/13 curated for E4112. tt 10/31/13 change to preferred question text. tt
